bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with wei pi 痿躄 , dysfunction with limping. BCGM dang gui 當 歸 quotes [Wang] Haogu 好古：主痿癖嗜臥，足下熱而痛 , “It controls dysfunction with aggregation illness and a desire to lie down. The soles of the feet are hot and painful”. In surviving texts written by Wang Haogu this term cannot be found. Su wen xuan ji yuan bing shi 素問玄機原病式 Liu qi wei bing 六氣為病 and Ru men shi qin 儒門事親 10 have: 痿厥嗜臥， 足下熱而痛 . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 SEs di huang 地黃 and tian men dong 天門冬 both have 痿 蹶嗜臥，足下熱而痛 . Hence 痿癖 may be a copying error.
